name: Pool With Friends
description:
Play an exciting 8 ball pool on your iPhone or iPad now! Rack the balls with a powerful break shot. Impress your friends your billiard playing skill! You don’t have to buy an expensive pool table just to enjoy fun and addictive pool party with your friends. Just download our app and play for FREE!

Do you love to play billiard? Have you ever dreamed of becoming a biliard or snooker master, playing bilyard on a pool live tour across the country? Maybe you even dream of participating in the World Pool Championship. To become a maestro, you must practice and play against tough opponents to sharpen your snooker skill. The problem is, like most people, you probably don’t have access to a pool table 24/7. However, you can still practice your skills by playing virtual 8ball pool on your iOS device. You can practice with your friends or random players who also enjoy playing snoker as much as you do.

Some people like to play 9 ball pool and some people enjoy 8ball pool games. In Pool with Friends, the game you can play is the 8 ball pool version. The rule of the game is slightly different than the 9 ball version. For example, in the 8ball version, you may not put the opponent’s balls into the pockets. By playing this game, you will be able to practice and learn about the rules of the game easily.

=============================================================
TOP FEATURES OF POOL WITH FRIENDS – EIGHT BALL POOL MULTIPLAYER:
=============================================================

#MULTIPLAYER BILLIARD GAME

Play with your friends offline or play with random players online. You can also play against yourself to practice your shots.

#REALISTIC 3D SIMULATOR

Pool with Friends uses an advanced and realistic physic simulator. You will see how the balls move on the pool table when you hit the ball with different strength and direction. Enjoy playing as if you are pool billiards pro.

#BEAUTIFUL AND REALISTIC GRAPHIC

We handcrafted the game graphic to make it look realistic and sharp. The graphic will help you determine how to make the best and most accurate shot.

#LEARN ABOUT THE RULES OF THE GAME WHILE PLAYING

After your turn, we will check the table and inform you if you’ve committed a foul. We will also inform you the name of the foul. For example Scratch is a foul when a player pockets the white ball. As the result, the opponent can choose where to place the white ball. This is a great way to memorize the rule of the 8 ball pool game.

#SMOOTH GAMEPLAY AND GAME CONTROL

To play this game, first tap on the table to place the ball to rack. Then adjust the direction and the strength. Tap on the Hit button to hit the white ball. It’s a very easy and straightforward gameplay, but it’s not easy to master. You need to practice to understand the physic of the game and how the ball moves when you hit using certain level of strength to a certain direction.

Play pool (8 Ball) with your friends around the world.
Using turn based multiplayer, you can have multiple games going at the same time. Requires GameCenter and internet to play.
Featuring realistic physics, great graphics, standard rules, fun gameplay and highscores.
Warning: Quitting the game after you hit the white ball and before your turn is over will result in a loss.

So, what are you waiting for? Download and play Pool with Friends for FREE now! Even when you don’t want to join World pool championship, you can still enjoy this realistic billiard game and beat your friends. After that, go on a virtual pool life tour in our app and conquer every snooker master you meet!
